Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly a throwback to the 80's Ninja craze era. Well, it is an enjoyable one and if you're a fan of either martial arts films or 80's action/ comedy films you should get a kick out of this one. I'm a fan of both
